lines.text: Well, uh... there was that fire, right?
So... maybe he's some kind of fire wizard? He's dressed for the part, anyway.
Doesn't sound like you've got a whole lot of evidence for that idea.
There's all kinds of ways that fire might've started- you're jumping to conclusions too early.
If you want to know what kind of magic this guy studied, you should <c=#FF00FF>read up</c> over at the bookshelf.
And check out his eyes! He's even got some sorta fire design tattooed on his face!
...Actually, wait. Those tattoos seem... familiar, somehow.
(I think I might <c=#FF00FF>already have the evidence</c> I need to say what type of wizard he is.)
Hey, Leo! I've got another idea!
And check out his eyes! He's even got some sorta fire design tattooed on his face! He's gotta specialize in burning stuff!
